segments.text: Helen , did you hear I â€™ m having a party ? Next Saturday in my place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I may have something on that day , but thanks for inviting me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , drop by if you can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will , do you want me to bring anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , just bring yourself . I hope to see you there .
segments.speaker: S1
